TCAs without major CYP2C19 metabolism include the secondary amines nortriptyline and desipramine. For tertiary amines, consider a 50% reduction of the recommended starting dose. Utilize therapeutic drug monitoring to guide dose adjustments. Titrate dose to observed clinical response with symptom improvement and minimal (if any) side effects.

The starting dose in this guideline refers to the recommended steady-state dose.

TCAs without major CYP2C19 metabolism include the secondary amines nortriptyline and desipramine. For tertiary amines, consider a 50% reduction of the recommended starting dose. Utilize therapeutic drug monitoring to guide dose adjustments. Titrate dose to observed clinical response with symptom improvement and minimal (if any) side effects.
